title: Human Sensation & Percep
description: An examination of human sensory systems and perceptual processes. Credit will not be awarded for both PSYC 4041 and PSYC 3041.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 2015 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
